juzs.text: Kare wa itta. `Sore de, anata gata no o yoken wa nandesuka, shito no kata gata yo
Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni tsukawasa reta nodesu
Doro no tsubute o (ame no yo ni) kare-ra no ue ni furasu tame ni
Ho rachi o tsukusu mono ni taishite,-nushi no omoto de shirusa reta (doro no tsubute o furasou).' To itta
Sore kara, ware wa soko ni ita shinja-tachi o tachi noka seyou to shita
Shikashi, sono (machi no)-chu de miidashita musurimu no ie wa, tada no ikken dakedeatta
Ware wa itamashi chobatsu o, osoreru mono no tame ni hitotsu no shirushi to shite soko ni nokoshita
Mata musa ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga akirakana ken'i o sazukete, kare o firuaun ni tsukawashita toki o omoiokose
Kare (firuaun) wa sono kensei o kasa ni, se o muke,`koitsu wa majutsu-shi ka, soretomo kichigaida.' To itta
Sorede are wa, kare to sono gunzei o toraete umi ni nagekonda. Hontoni kare wa, ke shikaranu monodeatta
Mata ado ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga sangai o motarasu kaze o kare-ra ni okutta toki o omoiokose
Sore wa kare-ra o osotte, subete o kaimetsu shi haikyo no yo ni shite, nani mo nokosanakatta
Mata samudo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). `Tsukanoma (no anata gata no nama) o tanoshime.' To iwa reta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Sonotoki kare-ra wa,-nushi no meirei ni ohei ni somuitanode, are yo to mite iru ma ni kaminari ni osowa reta
Mohaya kare-ra wa oki noboru koto mo dekizu, mata mamoru koto mo dekinakatta
Izen ni mo, nufu no min o (ware wa horoboshita). Hontoni kare-ra wa hangyaku no mindeatta
Ware wa iryoku o motte ten o uchi-date, hate shinai hirogari ni shita
Mata ware wa daichi o uchi hirogeta. Nanto migoto ni hirogeta koto yo
Mata ware wa, subete no mono o ryosei ni tsukutta. Anata gata wa kunkai o ukeirerudearou (to iu hairyo kara)
Sorede anata gata wa, arra no higo no shita ni omomuke. Hontoni watashi wa kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta komeina keikoku-shadearu
Sore de arra to issho ni soto no kami o tatete wa naranai. Hontoni watashi wa, kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta komeina keikoku-shadearu
Doyo ni kare-ra izen no mono mo, shito ga kare-ra ni yattekuru tabi ni,`majutsu-shi ka, matawa kichigaida.' To itta
Kare-ra wa sore o ikun to shite keisho shite kita no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa hogai no mindearu
Sore de, kare-ra o sakete sare. Anata gata wa (kare-ra no okonai ni taishite) togame wa nai nodearu
Daga kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa shinja-tachi o ekisuru
Jin to ningen o tsukutta no wa ware ni tsukae saseru tame
Ware wa kare-ra ni don'na kate mo motomezu, mata fuyo sa reru koto mo motomenai
Hontoni arra koso wa, kate o sadzuke rareru okata, kengonaru iryoku no omode ara reru
Akugyo no to no sazukari-bun (batsu) wa, kare-ra no nakama no sazukari-bun (batsu) to onajidearou.Dakara so (ware o) sekitatenakute mo i
Shinko shinai mono ni wazawai are. Yakusoku no hi ga kare-ra ni kanarazu yattekuru
Kano (keiji no) yama ni kakete (chikau)
Seizento kakishirusa reta Keisuke ni kakete
maka rete inai yohishi ni
fudan ni mode rareru seiden ni kakete
takaku kakage rareta tengai ni kakete
minagiri afureru taiyo ni kakete (chikau)
Hontoni omo no chobatsu wa kanarazu kudaru
Sore wa sake enai
Sonohi, ten wa oini yurayura to yure
mata yamayama wa yurugi ugokudearou
Sonohi,(shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono ni wazawai are
Munashi koto ni tawamurete ita-sha-tachi ni
Kare-ra ga (monosugoi chikara de) jigoku no hi no naka ni tsuki otosa reru sonohi
(ko iwa reyou. ) `Kore koso wa, anata gataga kyogidearu to shite ita jigoku no gokadearu
Kore demo majutsuna no ka. Soretomo anata gata wa, mienai no ka
Anata gata wa soko de yaka reruga i. Anata gataga sore o taeshinon demo, shinobanakute mo onaji koto. Anata gataga okonatta koto ni, mukui rareru dakedearu
Nushi o osoreta-sha-tachi wa kanarazu rakuen no yorokobi no naka ni 置Ri
nushi ga kare-ra ni ataeru mono ni kanki shi, mata omo ga goku hi no chobatsu kara kare-ra o sukuwa reta koto o yorokobu
(Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Tanoshinde tabe, katsu nome. Kore mo anata gata no (yoi) okonai no tamedearu
Kare-ra wa narabe rareta sofa ni yorikakari, ware wa utsukushi-me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigusha ni surudearou

Shinko suru mono-tachi, mata kare-ra ni shitagatta shinjinbukai shison no mono-tachi, ware wa, sorera no mono o (rakuen ni oite) isshonisuru. Kare-ra no subete no koi ni taishi, sukoshi mo (hosho o) keigen shinaidearou. Daremoga sono kasegi ni taishi, hoshu o ukeru
Mata ware wa kudamono, niku, sono soto kare-ra no nozomu mono o ataeyou
Kare-ra wa soko de tagaini hai o kawasou. Sono tokini mo munashi hanashi ni fukeru koto naku, ranbo mo okasanai
Kare-ra no shu ni wa, hime rareta shinju no yona kodomo ga kashizuite meguru
Kare-ra wa tagaini chikayotte, tazune ai
itte ita. `Izen, watashi-tachi wa kazoku no ma ni ite mo itsumo ki o nokotte ita
Daga arra wa, watashi-tachi ni onmegumi o atae rare, neppu no chobatsu kara o sukui kudasa reta
Izen kara watashi-tachi wa, kare ni inotte ita nodesu. Hontoni kare wa megumi atsuku, jihibukaki okata de ara reru
sa, kare-ra ni kunkai shi nasai. Omo no onkei ni yotte, anata wa uranaishi demo kichigai demonai
Mata kare-ra wa,`tada no shijinda. Kare no unsei ga gyakuten suru no o matou' to iu
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Matte iruga i. Watashi mo anata gata to tomoni matte iyou
Ittai kare-ra no mazushi rikai-ryoku ga ko meijita no ka, soretomo kare-ra wa hogaina min'na no ka
Matawa,`kare (muhanmado) ga kore o gisaku shita nodearu.' To iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa shinjite wa inai nodearu
Moshi kare-ra no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kore to onaji o tsuge o motte kosa seruga yoi
Kare-ra wa mu kara tsukura reta node wanai ka. Soretomo kare-ra jishin ga sozo-shana no ka
Soretomo kare-ra ga, ten to ji o sozo shita no ka. Iya, kare-ra ni wa shikkari shita shinko ga nai nodearu
Soretomo kare-ra wa, anata no omo no samazamana takaramono o motte iru no ka. Matawa (jibutsu no) kanrishana no ka
Soretomo kare-ra ni wa hashigo ga atte, sorede (ten ni nobori, sono himitsu o) kiku koto ga dekiru no ka. Sorenara kiita to iu mono ni, meikakuna shoko o motte kitasa seruga yoi
Soretomo anata gata ni wa musuko ga atte, kare ni wa musume ga aru (dake) to iu no ka
Soretomo anata ga, kare-ra ni hoshu o motome, sore de kare-ra wa fusai no omoni o otte iru to iu no ka
Soretomo yugen-kai no koto ga sukkari wakatte ite, sore o kakitomete iru to iu no ka
Soretomo (anata ni taishite) sakuwomegurasu tsumori ka. Daga haishin-sha-tachi koso, sakubo ni kakarudearou
Soretomo kare-ra wa, arra igai ni kami ga aru to iu no ka. Arra ni tatae are, kare wa haisuru mono (jashin) no ue ni ito takaku ora reru
Tatoe ten'noikkaku ga (kare-ra no ue ni) ochiru no o mite mo, kare-ra wa,`tsumikasanatta kumodesu.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa,(osore no tame ni) soko ni konto suru (shinpan no)-bi ni au made, hanatte oke
Sonohi kare-ra no sakubo wa, nani no eki mo naku, kekkyoku kare-ra wa tasuke rarenaidearou
Hontoni fugina okonai no mono ni wa, kono soto ni mo chobatsu ga aru. Daga, kare-ra no oku wa kidzukanai
Sore de omo no sabaki o taeshinonde mate. Hontoni ware wa anata gata o mimamotte iru. Soshite anata ga tachiagaru toki wa,-nushi o tatae nasai
Yonaka ni, mata shinshin ga shirizoku toki ni mo, kare o tatae nasai
Shizumi yuku hoshi ni kakete (chikau)
Anata gata no doryo wa, mayotte iru node wa naku, mata machigatte iru node mo nai
Mata (jibun no) nozomu koto o itte iru node mo nai
Sore wa kare ni keiji sa reta, o tsuge nihokanaranai
Narabinai iryoku no mochinushi ga, kare ni oshieta no wa
sugureta chiryoku no mochinushidearu. Massugu ni tatte
kare wa chihei no mottomo takai tokoro ni arawareta
Sore kara orite kite, chikadzuita
Oyoso yumi 2tsu, iya sore yori mo chikai kyorideatta ka
Soshite shimo be (muhanmado) ni, kare no keiji o tsugeta
Kokoro wa jibun ga mita koto o itsuwaranai
Kare no mita koto ni tsuite, anata gata wa kare to ronso suru no ka
Hontoni kare (muhanmado) wa, saido no koka ni oite mo, kare (jiburiru) o mita nodearu
(Dare mo kosenai) 涯 Ni aru, su~idora ki no hata de
Sono soba ni tsui no sumai no rakuen ga aru
Ou mono ga su~idora ki o konmori to ou toki
(Kare no) shisen wa suiyose rare, mata (bushitsuke ni)-do o sugosu koto mo nai
Kare wa tashika ni,-nushi no o no shirushi o mita nodearu
Anata gata wa, arrato to uzza o (nanidearu to) kangaeru ka
Sore kara dai 3-banme no manato o
Anata gata ni wa danshi ga ari, kare ni wa joshi ga aru to iu no ka
Soredewa, hontoni futona wakekatadearou

Sorera wa, anata gata ya sosen-tachi ga nadzuketa (tada no) namae ni suginai. Arra wa (don'na) ken'i o mo, sorera ni kudasa renakatta. Kare-ra (fushinjin-sha) wa, munashi okusoku ya shiyoku ni shitagatte iru nisuginai. Sudeni omo kara no michibiki ga, kare-ra ni kite irunoni
Oyoso ningen ni wa, hoshimono wa nani demo te ni hairu no ka
Iya, raise mo gense mo, arra no yudearu
Ten ni ikaga ni tenshi ga ite mo, arra ga nozoma re, sono o yorokobi ni azukaru mono ni taisuru o yurushi ga deta nochidenakereba, kare-ra (tenshi) no torinashi wa nani no yaku ni mo tatanai
Hontoni raise o shinjinai mono wa, tenshi ni josei no na o tsuke tari suru
Kare-ra wa (nani no) chishiki mo naku, okusoku ni shitagau dakedearu. Daga shinri ni taishite wa, okusoku nado nani mo yakudatsu wake wanai
Sorede anata wa ware no kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha, mata konoyo no seikatsu shika nozomanai mono kara tozakare

Kono teido (gense no seikatsu) ga, kare-ra no chishiki no todoku genkaidearu. Hontoni omo wa,-do kara mayotte iru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Mata kare wa, michibiki o ukeru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
Hontoni ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, arra no yudearu. Dakara akugyo no itazurani wa fusawashi mukui o atae rare, mata zenko no itazurani wa saizen no mono de mukuwa reru

Chisai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina koi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yosha wa hontoni kodaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijo butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
Anata wa (shinri kara) somuki saru mono o mita ka
Wazuka ni hodokoshi o shite wa,(-mono ka mi shite) tomeru
Soiu mono ni yugen-kai no chishiki ga atte, sorede nani demo mieru to iu no ka
Soretomo, musa no sho ni aru koto ga, tsuge rareta koto wa nai no ka
Mata (yakusoku o) kanzen ni hatashita iburahimu no koto mo
Omoni o ou mono wa, tanin no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai
Ningen wa, sono doryoku shita mono igai, nani mo eru koto wa dekinai
Sono doryoku (no seika) wa, yagate mitomerarerudearou
Yagate hosho wa, jubun ni mukui rareru
Hontoni anata no omoni koso, kichaku-sho wa aru
Kare koso wa, warawase nakaseru okata
Mata shina se, ikasu okatadearu
Hontoni kare wa, otome no kumiawase o tsukura reta
Sore mo seieki o fukikomu koto de
Mata 2-dome no sozo (no fukkatsu) mo, kare no okokoro no mamadearu
Kare koso wa toma se, mata michitari saseru okata
Mata okami hoshi (Shiriusu) no omo mo kono okata
Kare wa mukashi ado (no min) o horoboshi
Mata samudo mo hitori nokosazu horobosa reta
Sore izen ni nufu no min mo. Hontoni kare-ra wa, hidoi fugi, fusei no yakaradeatta
Mata (sodomutogomora no yo ni) tenpuku sa reta sho toshi
Soshite kare wa sore o oi sara reta
(Hitobito yo,) ittai-nushi no dono o megumi ni, anata gata wa iron o daku no ka
Kore wa, mukashi no keikoku-sha-tachi to onaji hitori no keikoku-shadearu
(Shinpan no toki wa) chikaku ni sematte kite iru
Sore wa arra no soto nanimono mo akiraka ni shi e enai
Anata gata hako no hanashi o kiite odoroite iru no ka
Chosho wa shite mo, nakanai no ka
Anata gata wa, ji 惚 No naka de toki o sugosu no ka
Ichizu ni arra ni sajida shi,(kare ni) tsukae nasai
Toki wa chikadzuki, tsuki wa mijin ni saketa
Kare-ra wa tatoe shirushi o mite mo, somuki satte,`koreha aikawarazu no majutsuda.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa (kunkai o) kyogidearu to shi, jibun no yokubo ni shitagatte kita. Daga issai no koto ni wa, sadame rareta ketsumatsu ga aru
Kore made, samazamana shosoku wa, sudeni motarasa re, sorede jubun jisei dekita hazu
Sore wa mezamashi eichideatta. Daga keikoku wa yakudatanakatta
Dakara anata wa, kare-ra kara tozakare. Shoshu-sha ga kirawa reru tokoro e yobidasu hi
Kare-ra wa me o fusete, chodo batta ga chirabaru yo ni hakaba kara dete kite
shoshu-sha no kata ni isogu. Fushinjin-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa dainan no hidesu
Kare-ra izen ni, nufu no min mo (sono yogen-sha o) kyogi to shi, waga shimo be o uso-tsuki yobawari shi,`kichigaidesu.' To itte tsuiho shita
Sore de kare wa omoni,`watashi wa, hontoni chikaratsukimashita. Do ka o tasuke kudasai.' To inotta
Sorede ware wa, ten no sho mon o hiraki mizu o sosogi fura seta
Mata daichi ni moroizumi o funshutsu sa se, mizu wa awasari, kanete no kami inochi ni yoru koto (kozui) ga okita
Shikashi ware wa ita to kugi de tsukutta mono (hakobune) ni kare o nosete yatta
Waga mimamoru naka de sore wa hashitta. Kore ga (mina kara) shirizoke rareta ano mono e no mukuidearu
Ware wa kore o hitotsu no shirushi to shite nokoshita. Sate dare ka satoru mono wa aru ka
Sa waga chobatsu to imashime to wa dodeatta ka
Hontoni ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sa, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Ado (no min) mo (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita. Sorede waga chobatsu to imashime to wa dodeatta ka
Ware wa saiyaku no uchitsudzuku hi ni, kare-ra ni taishi arekuruu kaze o okutta
Suruto ningen wa, nekosogi ni natta. Natsumeyashi no kirikabu no yo ni, mushiri sara reta
Ano toki no waga chobatsu to imashime to wa dodeatta ka
Makotoni ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku tokiakashita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Samudo (mo mata) keikoku o kyogidearu to shita
Soshite kare-ra wa itta. `Nani to, watashi-tachi no naka no ikkai no ningende wanaidesu ka. Doshite kon'na mono ni shitagaimasu ka. Sore koso jado, kichigaizatadesu
Watashi-tachi no ma de kare dake ni keiji ga kudasa reta nodesu ka. Iya, kare wa ouso-tsukidesu
(Ose rareta. ) `Kare-ra wa ashita shirudearou. Dochira ga daiuso-tsukidearu ka o
Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra o kokoromiru tame mesu rakuda o okurudearou. Anata wa taeshinobi kare-ra o mimamore
Soshite kare-ra ni rakuda to mizu o bunpai shi, junban ni nomu yo tsutae nasai
Daga kare-ra wa nakama o yobiyose, sono otoko wa (ken o) te ni toru to hiza no ken o kitte shimatta
Sonotoki no waga chobatsu to imashime to ga dodeatta ka
Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ni mukakkate (mimi o tsunzaku) hitokoe o kudasu to, kare-ra wa kachiku no kakoi ni tsukawareru kare kabu no yo ni natta
Ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Ruto no min mo keikoku o kyogidearu to shita
Ware wa saseki no arashi o kare-ra ni okutta. Ruto no kazoku dake wa betsudeatta. Reimei ni kare-ra o sukui
ware kara no onkei to shita. Ko no yo ni ware wa kansha suru mono ni mukuiru
(Ruto wa) waga chobatsu o kare-ra ni keikoku shita nodaga, kare-ra wa sono keikoku ni tsuite giwaku no nen o daita
Soshite kare no hinkyaku (tenshi) o, kare kara ubaou to shitanode, ware wa kare-ra no me o tsubushita. `Sa, waga chobatsu to keikoku o ajiwae
Akuru asa, eien no chobatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta
Sa waga chobatsu to keikoku o ajiwae
Ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sa, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Hontoni firuaun no ichizoku ni mo keikoku-sha ga tsukawasa reta
(Daga) ware no shuju no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita. Sorede ware wa, idaide kyoryokuna mono no 一摑 Mi de, kare-ra o toraeta
Anata gata fushinjin-sha (kuraishu-zoku) no kata ga, korera no mono yori mo sugurete iru no ka. Soretomo Keisuke no naka ni anata gata no tame no shamen ga aru no ka
Soretomo kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa mina shori o eru monodesu.' To demo iu no ka
Yagate korera no hitobito wa yabure sari, nige sarudearou
Iya (shinpan no)-ji wa, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta kigendearu. Shikamo sono tokiniha, mottomo nagekawashi mottomo kurushi me ni audearou
Hontoni korera no tsumi o okashite iru-sha-tachi wa, meimo to chobatsu no uchi ni aru
Hi no naka ni kao o shita ni shite hikizura reru sonohi, kare-ra wa,`moka no fure guai o ajiwai nasai.'(To iwa reyou)
Hontoni ware wa subete no jibutsu o, kichinto hakatte sozo shita
Mata waga meirei wa tada hitokoto, Shun no yona monodearu

Daisho subete no koto ga, hitoshiku kakitome rarete iru

Don'na wake de anata gata wa, arra o shinko shinai no ka. Shito wa, anata gata no omo o shinko suru yo yobikakete iru. Moshi anata gataga shinjanara, kare wa sudeni anata gata no seiyaku o ukeire rareta nodearu
Kare koso wa, anata gata o ankoku kara komyo ni tsuredasu tame ni, sono shimo be ni meiryona shirushi o kudasa reta katadearu. Arra wa, anata gata ni shinsetsude jihibukaku ara reru

Don'na wake de anata gata wa, arra no michi no tame hodokosanai no ka. Hontoni tenchi no isan no sozoku wa, arra ni zokusuru. Anata gata no naka, shori no mae ni (zai o) hodokoshi sento suru mono to,-go kara so suru mono to onajide wanai. Korera no mono wa,(shori no)-go ni hodokoshite sento suru mono yori mo koidearu. Daga arra wa, subete no mono ni zen (ki hosho) o yakusoku sa reta. Hontoni arra wa, anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
Arra ni yoi kashi o, kashi tsukeru mono wa dare ka. Kare wa sore o bai ni sa re,(sono soto ni) kimaenoyoi hosho o sazukerudearou

Sonohi anata wa, shinja no otoko to shinja no on'na no, mae no kata ya migigawa ni, kare-ra no hikari ga hashiru no o mirudearou. (Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Kyo wa, anata gata e no kippo ga aru. Kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen no kotodearu. Eien ni sono naka ni sumu nodearu. Sore koso wa, hontoni idaina kofuku no jojudearu

Sonohi, nise shinja no danjo wa, shinja ni iudearou. `Watashi-tachi o matte kure, anata gatakara hikari o karitai.'(Daga kare-ra ni wa) iwa reyou. `Ushiro ni hikikaese, soshite hikari o motome nasai.' Sokode kare-ra no ma ni kabe ga moke rareru. Soko ni hitotsu no mon ga aru ga, sono uchigawa ni wa jihi ga, sono sotogawa ni wa chobatsu ga aru

Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa,`watashi-tachi wa, anata gata to isshode wanai ka.' To sakebudearou. Gimansha ga, arra ni tsuite anata gata o azamuita nodearu

Kyo to natte wa, anata gata no minoshirokin wa ukeire rarenaidearou. Mata (Akira-ra-samana) fushin-sha-tachi wa naonokoto. Anata gata no sumai wa jigoku no gokadearu. Sore wa anata gata no tomoda. Nanto warui kaeri-shodearu koto yo

(Hontoni) shinko surunaraba, arra no kyokun ni, mata, keiji sa reta shinri ni, kokoro o munashiku shite junpo suru toki ga mada yattekonai no ka. Izen ni keiten o 授 Tte inagara,(kan'yo no toki ga) nobasa rete, kokoro ga ganko ni natta mono no yodeatte wa naranai node wanai ka. Kare-ra no oku wa arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu
Anata gata wa, ichido shinda daichi o arra ga yomigaera sa reru koto o shire. Ware wa shuju no shirushi o anata gata no tame ni meiji shita. Osoraku anata gata wa satorudearou
Hodokoshi o suru otoko to hodokoshi o suru on'na to arra ni yoi kashi o, kashi tsuke suru mono ni wa, kare wa sore o bai ni sa re,(sono soto ni) kimaenoyoi hosho o sazukerudearou

Arra to sono shito o shinjiru mono, korera no mono wa (shinri o aisuru) shinjitsuna monodeari,-nushi no o me ni wa jissho-shadearu. Kare-ra ni wa hosho to komyo ga arou.Daga shinjinai mono mata waga shuju no shirushi o usodearu to iu mono, korera no mono wa, goka no junindearou

Anata gata no gense no seikatsu wa asobi tawamure ni sugizu, mata kyoshoku to, tagai no ma no kojideari, zaisan to shijo no hariai ni suginai koto o shire. (Gense no seikatsu o) tatoereba jiu no yona mono de,(sakumotsu wa) seicho shite fushinjin-sha (nofu) o yorokobaseru. Yagate sore wa karete kiiro ni kawari, tsuide konagona ni nari hateru no o anata gata wa mirudearou. Daga raise ni oite wa (fugi no to ni) kibishi chobatsu ga ari, mata (seigi no itazurani wa) arra kara kan'yo to zen-sho o sazukarou. Hontoni gense no seikatsu wa, munashi giman no kyoraku ni suginai

Anata gata wa omo kara no kan'yo (o kou tame) ni, aikiso tte doryoku shi nasai. Sore wa tenchi no hiro-sa hodo no kodaina rakuen de, arra to shito o shinjiru mono no tame ni junbi sa rete iru. Kore wa arra no onkei de okokoro ni kanau mono ni sore o sazukeru. Hontoni arra wa, idaina onkei no omode ara reru

Chijo ni oite okoru wazawai 危 Mo, mata anata gata no minoue ni kudaru mono mo, hitotsu to shite ware ga sore o sazukeru mae ni, shosatsu no naka ni shirusa rete inai mono wanai. Sore wa arra ni oite wa, yoina godearu
Sore wa anata gata ga ushinatta tame ni kanashimazu, atae rareta tame ni, manshin shinai tamedearu. Hontoni arra wa, unubore no tsuyoi koman'na mono o o konomi ni nara renai
Kon'na mono wa monooshimidearukara, hitobito ni mo monooshimi o susumeru. Tatoe dareka (omo no michi kara) somuki satte mo, arra wa motomoto michi tara reru okatadeari, sanbi subeki okatadearu

Jitsuni ware wa meisho o sazukete shito-tachi o tsukawashi, mata kare-ra to issho ni, Keisuke to (seija no) hakari o kudashita. Sore wa hitobito ga seigi o okonau tamedearu. Mata ware wa tetsu o kudashita. Soreni wa idaina chikara ga ari, mata ningen no tame ni shuju no ben'eki o kyosuru. Sore wa arra ga, mitsu ni kare o tasukeru mono, mata shito-tachi o tasukeru mono o, shitte ora reru tamedearu. Hontoni arra wa kyodai ni shite iryoku narabinaki ho de ara reru

Ware wa, izen, nufu to iburahimu o tsukawashita. Mata ware wa ryosha no shison ni yogen no tenbun to keiten o sazuketa. Sore de kare-ra no aru mono wa michibika reta. Daga, oku no mono wa arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta

Sorekara waga shito o, kare-ra no ashiato ni shitagawa se, sarani maruyamu no ko isa o tsukawashi, fukuin o sazuke, mata kare-ra ni shitagau mono no mune ni hakuai to jihi no jo o mota seta. Daga kin'yoku no shudoin-sei wa, kare-ra ga jibun de tsukutta mono de, ware ga kare-ra ni sore o shiji shite wa inai. Arra no yorokobi o etai bakari ni shita kotodaga, kare-ra wa sore mo mamoraneba naranai yo ni wa mamotte inakatta. Sorede ware wa, kare-ra no naka no shinko suru mono ni wa hosho o ataeta. Daga kare-ra no oku no mono wa arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta

Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, arra o osore, kare no shito o shinji nasai. Kare wa bai no jihi o sazuke, mata komyo o anata gata no tame ni moke, sorede (tadashi michi o) ayuma se, mata anata gata (no kako no zaigo) o yurusa reru. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru

Arra no onkei o kare-ra ga sukoshi mo sayu dekinai koto o, mata onkei wa arra no ote no naka ni aru to iu koto o keiten'notami wa shiru ga i. Kare no o kokoronikanau-sha wa, sore o sazukaru. Hontoni arra wa idaina onkei no omodearu
